短.definition: short; brief; to lack; weak point; fault

短中取長.definition: see 短中抽長|短中抽长[duan3 zhong1 chou1 chang2]

短中抽長.definition: to make the best of a bad job; to make the best use of limited resources (idiom)

短促.definition: short in time; fleeting; brief; gasping (breath); curt (tone of voice)

短兵相接.definition: lit. short-weaponed soldiery fight one another (idiom); fierce hand-to-hand infantry combat; to fight at close quarters

短嘴山椒鳥.definition: (bird species of China) short-billed minivet (Pericrocotus brevirostris)

短嘴豆雁.definition: (bird species of China) tundra bean goose (Anser serrirostris)

短嘴金絲燕.definition: (bird species of China) Himalayan swiftlet (Aerodramus brevirostris)

短多.definition: good prospects in the short term (finance)

短小精悍.definition: (of a person) short but plucky (idiom); (of an article) concise and forceful

短少.definition: to be short of the full amount

短尾信天翁.definition: (bird species of China) short-tailed albatross (Phoebastria albatrus)

短尾賊鷗.definition: (bird species of China) parasitic jaeger (Stercorarius parasiticus)

短尾鴉雀.definition: (bird species of China) short-tailed parrotbill (Suthora davidiana)

短尾鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Asian stubtail (Urosphena squameiceps)

短尾鷦鶥.definition: (bird species of China) streaked wren-babbler (Gypsophila brevicaudata)

短尾鷯鶥.definition: (bird species of China) rufous-throated wren-babbler (Spelaeornis caudatus)

短尾鸌.definition: (bird species of China) short-tailed shearwater (Ardenna tenuirostris)

短尾鸚鵡.definition: (bird species of China) vernal hanging parrot (Loriculus vernalis)

短工.definition: temporary job; odd job; seasonal worker

短打扮.definition: clothing that exposes the arms and legs (e.g. shorts, sleeveless top); to wear such clothing

短指.definition: brachydactylism (genetic abnormality of short or missing fingers)

短板.definition: short stave of the barrel (which allows the contents to escape); (fig.) shortcoming; weak point

短欠.definition: to fall short in one's payments; to lack; to be short of

短空.definition: poor prospects in the short term (finance)

短耳鴞.definition: (bird species of China) short-eared owl (Asio flammeus)

短處.definition: shortcoming; defect; fault; one's weak points

短衣幫.definition: lit. short jacket party; working people; the toiling masses; blue collar workers

短視近利.definition: to be focused on short-term gain

短趾鵰.definition: (bird species of China) short-toed snake eagle (Circaetus gallicus)

短距起落飛機.pinyin: duǎn jù qǐ luò fēi jī

短距離.definition: short distance; a stone's throw away
